title: LF Good Normals Team!
body:
I have ~70% solo win rate, and I want to get to level 30, but I'm losing a lot of my games thanks to afkers and trolls.
I'm looking for a team with the same if not a better solo win rate. Theoretically, if we all have 70% solo win rates, we should have a 95% 5-man pre-made win rate.

I play Tryndamere top, but if I **really** have to, I'll play Tryndamere jungle.

{{champion:23}} 
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=orange%20caramel

Post here AND add me in game.

replies.body: I just won a 3v5 in which the two trolls intentionally fed, trash talked us then afked. I really want a 5-man premade.
Level 13 Tryndamere main, this is some top kek.
